00027 void GLWidget::calcCoords()
00028 {
00029     const NetCache& cache = p_net->getCache();
00030 
00031     unsigned total_layers = cache.data.size();
00032     unsigned total_threads = cache.data[0].size();
00033 
00034     //Form colors for threads
00035     srand(42);
00036     vector<QColor> threadColors;
00037     for(unsigned i = 0; i < total_threads; ++i)
00038         threadColors.push_back(QColor(200 + rand() % 55 , rand() % 100, rand() % 100));
00039 
00040     for(unsigned layer = 0; layer < total_layers; ++layer)
00041     {
00042         unsigned layer_size = 0;
00043         for(unsigned thread = 0; thread < total_threads; ++thread)
00044             layer_size += cache.data[layer][thread].size();
00045 
00046         unsigned neuron_number = 0;
00047         for(unsigned thread = 0; thread < total_threads; ++thread)
00048         {
00049             for(unsigned i = 0; i < cache.data[layer][thread].size(); ++i)
00050             {
00051                 const Neuron* neuronIter = cache.data[layer][thread][i];
00052                 unsigned planeRows = sqrt(layer_size);
00053                 unsigned planeCols = layer_size / planeRows;
00054 
00055                 const Attributes& oglHint = neuronIter->oglHint;
00056                 Coords c;
00057 
00058                 if(oglHint.is(OpenGlHint::coord_x))
00059                     c.x = oglHint[OpenGlHint::coord_x];
00060                 else
00061                     c.x = (GLdouble) ( (GLdouble)layer - total_layers/2.0 + 1.0) * 100;
00062 
00063                 if(oglHint.is(OpenGlHint::coord_y))
00064                     c.y = oglHint[OpenGlHint::coord_y];
00065                 else
00066                     c.y = (GLdouble) ( (GLdouble)(neuron_number / planeCols) - planeRows/2.0 + 1.0 ) * 40.0;
00067                 
00068                 if(oglHint.is(OpenGlHint::coord_z))
00069                     c.z = oglHint[OpenGlHint::coord_z];
00070                 else
00071                     c.z = (GLdouble) ( (GLdouble)(neuron_number % planeCols) - planeCols/2.0 + 1.0 ) * 40.0;
00072 
00073                 c.color = threadColors[thread];
00074                 if(oglHint.is(OpenGlHint::color_r))
00075                     c.color.setRed(oglHint[OpenGlHint::color_r]);
00076                 if(oglHint.is(OpenGlHint::color_g))
00077                     c.color.setGreen(oglHint[OpenGlHint::color_g]);
00078                 if(oglHint.is(OpenGlHint::color_b))
00079                     c.color.setBlue(oglHint[OpenGlHint::color_b]);
00080 
00081                 coords[neuronIter] = c;
00082                 neuron_number++;
00083             }
00084         }
00085     }
00086 }

00088 void GLWidget::drawNetModel()
00089 {
00090     GLUquadric* q = gluNewQuadric();
00091     gluQuadricNormals(q, GLU_SMOOTH);
00092 
00093     glNewList(1,GL_COMPILE);
00094     
00095     const Neuron* biasNeuron = (p_net->getNeurons().find(p_net->getBiasId()))->second;
00096 
00097     //For every neuron draw Link::in connections
00098     map<unsigned, Neuron*>::const_iterator iter = p_net->getNeurons().begin();
00099     for(; iter != p_net->getNeurons().end(); ++iter)
00100     {
00101         Coords to_coords = coords[iter->second];
00102 
00103         //Draw neuron
00104         glPushMatrix();
00105         qglColor(to_coords.color);
00106         glTranslated(to_coords.x, to_coords.y, to_coords.z);
00107         gluSphere(q, neuronRadius, 12, 12); 
00108         glPopMatrix();
00109 
00110         if(drawLinks)
00111         {
00112             //Draw it's Link::in connections
00113             qglColor(QColor(0, 255, 0));
00114             list<Link>::const_iterator link_iter = iter->second->links.begin();
00115             for(; link_iter != iter->second->links.end(); ++link_iter)
00116             {
00117                 if(link_iter->getDirection() == Link::out)
00118                     continue;
00119 
00120                 if(link_iter->getTo() == biasNeuron && !drawBiasLinks)
00121                     continue;
00122 
00123                 if(linkRate > 1 && (rand() % linkRate != 0))
00124                     continue;
00125 
00126                 Coords from_coords = coords[link_iter->getTo()];
00127 
00128                 glBegin(GL_LINES);
00129                 glVertex3d(from_coords.x, from_coords.y, from_coords.z);
00130                 glVertex3d(to_coords.x, to_coords.y, to_coords.z);
00131                 glEnd();
00132             }
00133         }
00134     }
00135 
00136     glEndList();
00137 
00138     gluDeleteQuadric(q);
00139 }

00141 void GLWidget::setInfoNeuron(unsigned _id)
00142 {
00143     const Neuron* n = p_net->getNeurons().find(_id)->second;
00144     ostringstream ost;
00145     ost<<"Neuron info:\n"
00146         <<"ID: "<<_id<<endl
00147         <<"ActivationFunction: "<<n->getActivationFunction()->getName()<<endl
00148         <<"Owner: "<<n->getOwnerThread()<<endl
00149         <<"Receptive field: "<<n->receptiveField<<endl
00150         <<"Activation value: "<<n->activationValue<<endl
00151         <<"Links: "<<n->links.size()<<endl
00152         <<endl;
00153 
00154     info_label->setText(ost.str().c_str());
00155 }

00157 void GLWidget::setInfoNet()
00158 {
00159     ostringstream ost;
00160     ost<<"Net info:\n"
00161         <<"Neurons: "<<p_net->getNeurons().size()<<endl
00162         <<"Threads: "<<p_net->getThreadCount()<<endl
00163         <<endl<<endl;
00164 
00165     if(!drawLinks)
00166         ost<<"Note: links are not shown"<<endl;
00167 
00168     if(!drawBiasLinks)
00169         ost<<"Note: bias connections are not shown"<<endl;
00170 
00171     ost<<"Note: only every "<<linkRate<<"-th link is shown"<<endl;
00172     
00173     ost<<endl<<endl;
00174     
00175     ost<<"Hint: "<<endl;
00176     ost<<"'W', 'A', 'S', 'D', drag with mouse middle button - move around"<<endl;
00177     ost<<"'+', '-', mouse wheel  - zoom"<<endl;
00178     ost<<"'Up', 'Down', 'Left', 'Right' - rotate X-Y"<<endl;
00179     ost<<"Drag with left mouse button - rotate X-Y"<<endl;
00180     ost<<"Drag with right mouse button - rotate X-Z"<<endl;
00181 
00182     info_label->setText(ost.str().c_str());
00183 }

00185 void GLWidget::normalizeAngle(int *angle)
00186 {
00187     while (*angle < 0)
00188         *angle += 360 * 16;
00189     while (*angle > 360 * 16)
00190         *angle -= 360 * 16;
00191 }
00192 
00193 void GLWidget::setXRotation(int angle)
00194 {
00195     normalizeAngle(&angle);
00196     if (angle != xRot) {
00197         xRot = angle;
00198         updateGL();
00199     }
00200 }

00202 void GLWidget::setYRotation(int angle)
00203 {
00204     normalizeAngle(&angle);
00205     if (angle != yRot) {
00206         yRot = angle;
00207         updateGL();
00208     }
00209 }

00211 void GLWidget::setZRotation(int angle)
00212 {
00213     normalizeAngle(&angle);
00214     if (angle != zRot) {
00215         zRot = angle;
00216         updateGL();
00217     }

00220 void GLWidget::setScale(float _scale)
00221 {
00222     if(_scale != scale && _scale > 0.1 && _scale < 10.0)
00223     {
00224         scale = _scale;
00225         updateGL();
00226     }
00227 }

00234         yTrans = _y;

00240 void GLWidget::restoreDefaults()
00241 {
00242     setTranslation(0, 0, 0);
00243     setScale(1.0);
00244     setXRotation(0);
00245     setYRotation(0);
00246     setZRotation(0);
00247 
00248     neuronRadius = 7;
00249     //TODO: customize this parametrs on the fly
00250     drawLinks = true;
00251     drawBiasLinks = true;
00252     linkRate = 1;
00253 
00254     updateGL();
00255 }

00257 void GLWidget::initializeGL()
00258 {
00259     // Antialiasing
00260     glEnable(GL_LINE_SMOOTH);
00261     glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00262     glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA,GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA);
00263     glHint(GL_LINE_SMOOTH_HINT,GL_NICEST);
00264     glLineWidth(1.5);
00265     glPointSize(1.0);
00266 
00267     //Light
00268     glEnable(GL_LIGHTING);
00269     glEnable(GL_COLOR_MATERIAL);
00270     glColorMaterial(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, GL_AMBIENT_AND_DIFFUSE);
00271     glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH);
00272     glEnable(GL_LIGHT0);
00273     GLfloat position[]  = { -width()/5.0f, height()/2.0f, 100.0f , 1.0f};
00274     glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_POSITION, position);
00275  
00276     GLfloat specular[] = {0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f , 1.0f};
00277     GLfloat ambient[]  = {0.2f, 0.2f, 0.2f , 1.0f};
00278     GLfloat diffuse[]  = {0.8f, 0.8f, 0.8f , 1.0f};
00279     glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_SPECULAR, specular);
00280     glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_AMBIENT, ambient);
00281     glLightfv(GL_LIGHT0, GL_DIFFUSE, diffuse);
00282 
00283     float specReflection[] = { 0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f, 1.0f };
00284     glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT, GL_SPECULAR, specReflection);
00285     glMateriali(GL_FRONT, GL_SHININESS, 50);
00286 
00287 /*
00288     GLfloat material_specular[] = {1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f};
00289     GLfloat material_emission[] = {1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f};
00290     glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, GL_SPECULAR, material_specular);
00291     glMaterialfv(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK, GL_EMISSION, material_emission);
00292 */
00293 
00294     glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00295     glEnable(GL_CULL_FACE);
00296     glPolygonMode(GL_FRONT_AND_BACK,GL_FILL);
00297 
00298     qglClearColor(QColor::fromCmykF(0.39, 0.39, 0.0, 0.0).dark());
00299 }

00301 void GLWidget::paintGL()
00302 {
00303     glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00304     glLoadIdentity();
00305     glTranslated(xTrans, yTrans, zTrans);
00306     glRotated(xRot / 16.0, 1.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00307     glRotated(yRot / 16.0, 0.0, 1.0, 0.0);
00308     glRotated(zRot / 16.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0);
00309     glScaled(scale,scale,scale);
00310     glCallList(1);
00311 }
00312 
00313 void GLWidget::resizeGL(int width, int height)
00314 {
00315     glViewport(0, 0, width, height);
00316 
00317     glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00318     glLoadIdentity();
00319     glOrtho(-width/2,width/2, -height/2,height/2 ,-(width+height),(width+height));
00320     glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00321 }

00323 void GLWidget::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
00324 {
00325     lastPos = event->pos();
00326 }
00327 
00328 void GLWidget::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
00329 {
00330     int dx = event->x() - lastPos.x();
00331     int dy = event->y() - lastPos.y();
00332 
00333     if (event->buttons() & Qt::LeftButton) {
00334         setXRotation(xRot + 8 * dy);
00335         setYRotation(yRot + 8 * dx);
00336     } else if (event->buttons() & Qt::RightButton) {
00337         setXRotation(xRot + 8 * dy);
00338         setZRotation(zRot + 8 * dx);
00339     } else if (event->buttons() & Qt::MidButton) {
00340         setTranslation(xTrans + dx, yTrans - dy, zTrans);
00341     }
00342     lastPos = event->pos();
00343 }
00344 
00345 void GLWidget::keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent* e)
00346 {
00347     const int rotationDelta = 30.0;
00348     const float scaleDelta = 0.05;
00349     const float translateDelta = 10;
00350     
00351     switch(e->key())
00352     {
00353         case Qt::Key_Up:
00354             setXRotation(xRot + rotationDelta);
00355             break;
00356         case Qt::Key_Down:
00357             setXRotation(xRot - rotationDelta);
00358             break;
00359         case Qt::Key_Left:
00360             setYRotation(yRot + rotationDelta);
00361             break;
00362         case Qt::Key_Right:
00363             setYRotation(yRot - rotationDelta);
00364             break;
00365         case Qt::Key_Plus:
00366             setScale(scale + scaleDelta);
00367             break;
00368         case Qt::Key_Minus:
00369             setScale(scale - scaleDelta);
00370             break;
00371         case Qt::Key_W:
00372             setTranslation(xTrans, yTrans - translateDelta, zTrans);
00373             break;
00374         case Qt::Key_S:
00375             setTranslation(xTrans, yTrans + translateDelta, zTrans);
00376             break;
00377         case Qt::Key_A:
00378             setTranslation(xTrans + translateDelta, yTrans, zTrans);
00379             break;
00380         case Qt::Key_D:
00381             setTranslation(xTrans - translateDelta, yTrans, zTrans);
00382             break;
00383         case Qt::Key_Space:
00384             restoreDefaults();
00385             break;
00386         default:
00387             return;
00388     }
00389     //updateGL();
00390 }

00392 void GLWidget::wheelEvent(QWheelEvent* event)
00393 {
00394 //    setTranslation(xTrans - x() + width() / 2.0, yTrans + y() - height() / 2.0, zTrans);
00395     setScale(scale + event->delta() / 200.0);
00396 }
